review: Bought this hoping it would handle Netflix better than our Wii u system.  We pretty much replaced the Wii u (with probably a thousand dollars worth of accessories and games) with just this little thing.  The free games are great for a 5 year old, and Netflix supports profiles (unlike the horrible Wii u app that somehow does not).
